alert.note: Alert for Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 16 at 2:30AM AKST until January 17 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions ongoing. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will create whiteout conditions at times. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
